title: Was Dead Kennedys’ Jello Biafra Sued By His Bandmates Over a Levi’s Commercial?
subtitle: Biafra has long claimed that an acrimonious lawsuit over royalties stemmed from his former bandmates' desire for advertising revenue.
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: Dead Kennedys frontman Jello Biafra was sued by his bandmates because he didn’t want one of their songs used in a Levi’s commercial.
